title: Short-Intensive Course for Strengthening Online Competency-Based Elementary Science Preservice Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science pedagogy and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: A project-based learning course centered on formative assessments conducted in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose elementary science lesson design competencies with 80% accuracy through rubric-based self-assessment
Learners can synthesize peer and instructor feedback to develop improvement plans for learning activities with over 90% effectiveness.
Learners can complete three or more competency-based microlearning modules in a mobile environment and achieve at least 75% proficiency through real-time quizzes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
